Episodes.Title: Uno
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gordon Smith
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Struggling public defender Jimmy McGill constructs an elaborate yet questionable plan for winning back a pair of wealthy potential clients.

Episodes.Title: Mijo
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gordon Smith
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy's latest scam has gone horribly wrong and he's face-to-face with violent criminals and being forced to talk his way out of a life-threatening situation.

Episodes.Title: Nacho
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Thomas Schnauz
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy must prove that Nacho is innocent when he is wrongly suspected of kidnapping.

Episodes.Title: Hero
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gennifer Hutchison
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy makes a bold move against Hamlin in an effort to attract potential clients.

Episodes.Title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Bradley Paul
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: After a strange encounter with the police, Chuck ends up in the hospital. Jimmy meets up with a series of unruly clients.

Episodes.Title: Five-O
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gordon Smith
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Mike's days as a police officer in Philadelphia catch up to him when he's questioned about a tragic event from his past.

Episodes.Title: Bingo
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gennifer Hutchison
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: The Kettlemans seek Jimmy as their lawyer after turning down an offer from HHM.

Episodes.Title: RICO
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gordon Smith
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy discovers the Sandpiper Retirement Home has been scamming his elderly clients, and prepares to take legal action.

Episodes.Title: Pimento
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Thomas Schnauz
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Chuck wants to transfer the Sandpiper case to HHM much to Jimmy's dismay. Mike gets a job offer working as a bodyguard.

Episodes.Title: Marco
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gordon Smith
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy seizes an opportunity to reconnect with an old friend; Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.
